name: Untitled Shooty Game (futur_null)
description:
[ ABOUT ]

Thanks for checking out this project. It... didn't end up quite finished, but I think there's some stuff here that's worth checking out. If nothing else I learned a lot about Godot.

Your job is to avoid being hit by bullets, and destroying enemies. By default, WASD
moves and ARROW KEYS shoot. You can change this via settings.

Enemies all have their own behaviours. Some are pretty harmless, but some will shoot at you, or worse. Make use of strategy!

Getting uncomfortably close to enemies increases your score, but so does killing them very quickly. Best of luck!

[ CREDITS ]

(c) 2022 by futur_null.

This game uses the following tools and assets, available under various CC licences:

    Godot Engine 3.4.4

    Qurobullet by Quinnvoker: https://github.com/quinnvoker/qurobullet

    Create Mixer by Kenney: https://kenney.itch.io/creature-mixer

    Today Land Retired Characters by TurbografxKid: https://opengameart.org/content/today-land-retired-characters

    NES 8-bit sound effects by shiru8bit: https://opengameart.org/content/nes-8-bit-sound-effects

    The Essential Retro Video Game Sound Effects Collection [512 sounds] by SubspaceAudio: https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style

    Car graphics from https://openclipart.org/

    Albatross v2 by Computer Music All-Stars: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Computer_Music_All-Stars/none_given_1781/CMAl...

    Xanadon't by Mystery Mammal: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Mystery_Mammal/latency/Xanadont_1334/

    LATENCY by Mystery Mammal: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Mystery_Mammal/latency/L_A_T_E_N_C_Y_online-a...
